Created an attachment (id=37972)
Jmdns feature build v0.7.7 with fix for this bug applied

This provides a fix for the bug reported 4/5/2006 by B Joy to the ECF newsgroup.
Fix applied and tested with 3.1 and 3.2M6.  See above attachment for fix prior to 0.7.7 stable build.  The above is the entire jmdns provider feature.
